missionVision.title: Our Mission & Vision
missionVision.intro: InteriMed was founded with a clear goal: to revolutionize healthcare recruitment in Switzerland by creating a platform that addresses the specific needs of healthcare facilities and professionals.

experienceSection.title: Our Experience
experienceSection.paragraph1: With over 50 years of combined experience in the healthcare sector, our team understands the unique challenges faced by healthcare facilities in finding qualified staff, as well as the needs of healthcare professionals seeking flexible work opportunities.
experienceSection.paragraph2: This expertise has allowed us to develop a platform that simplifies the recruitment process while maintaining the high standards required in the healthcare sector.

insightSection.title: Our Insight
insightSection.paragraph1: We believe that the future of work in healthcare will be increasingly flexible, with growing demand for solutions that allow facilities to quickly adapt to changing needs and professionals to find better work-life balance.

points.title: Quality:
points.text: We rigorously verify the qualifications and experience of all professionals on our platform.

points.title: Innovation:
points.text: We continuously invest in technology to improve user experience and recruitment efficiency.

points.title: Transparency:
points.text: We believe in clear and honest communication with all our partners.

missionVision.conclusion: By choosing InteriMed, you're selecting a partner who understands the nuances of the Swiss healthcare sector and is committed to providing high-quality recruitment solutions.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: InteriMed was founded by two pharmacists with technical expertise and strong industry relationships, leveraging their domain knowledge to create a tailored solution for the healthcare sector.
story.paragraph2: After personally experiencing the challenges of finding qualified staff and securing flexible work in healthcare, they set out to create a solution that would benefit both facilities and professionals.
story.paragraph3: Starting with the pharmaceutical sector in French-speaking Switzerland, InteriMed aims to become the leading platform for temporary recruitment in the healthcare sector across Switzerland and neighboring countries.
